ygData.subject: AW: [eqbards] Bard Stacking?
ygData.msgSnippet: no idea... there was some issues with stacking songs and some epic effects if i remember correctly. but in fact, i do not =) anyone has more information on
ygData.messageBody:
no idea...

there was some issues with stacking songs and some epic effects if i
remember correctly. but in fact, i do not =)

anyone has more information on this?

tobi

update
in a future patch.
